Initial Development

Wordpress Integration



Goal

The point of this checklist is to make it easier to manage code. This has been split into two sections, one for Initial Development and one for WordPress Integration to be in alignment with AtTask's structure. This form does not submit anywhere, it is just a form to go through per-build in order to make sure we have covered everything.
